text: @DrDenaGrayson Starting July 1, it will still not be possible for Non-EU citizens to enter Germany except for ‘essential’ travel; transit only while not leaving the airport... So yes, US folks are absolutely travel-banned #covid19  https://t.co/8VMLJgS18U
